Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am extending this opportunity to purchase it directly from me at an exclusive price of $115. This is a special offer tailored just for you, aiming to provide you with the best value while ensuring you benefit from the product's full potential. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly remarkable. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $115. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $115
(2) Reject Alice's offer
